item.title: Regulator To Investigate ChatGPT Founder Sam Altman’s Worldcoin (WLD) Crypto Project
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The UK data regulator on Tuesday said it will study the Worldcoin iris biometric project by OpenAI CEO Sam Altman to find risks such as privacy and safety associated with the project. Worldcoin launched on Monday, with major crypto exchanges racing to list the WLD token. The price fell after experts raised concerns regarding Worldcoin

The post Regulator To Investigate ChatGPT Founder Sam Altman’s Worldcoin (WLD) Crypto Project appeared first on CoinGape.

item.title: Breaking: Binance Japan To Launch In August, Says CEO CZ
item.dc:creator: Varinder Singh
item.description:
The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance to start offering full services on its new platform for users in Japan by August, CEO Changpeng “CZ” Zhao said on Tuesday. Last year, Binance acquired 100% stake in the Japanese crypto trading platform Sakura Exchange BitCoin (SEBC) to re-enter the Japanese market as a regulated crypto platform. Binance

The post Breaking: Binance Japan To Launch In August, Says CEO CZ appeared first on CoinGape.

item.dc:creator: Bhushan Akolkar
item.description:
Crypto exchange Binance, its founder Changpeng Zhao, and former Chief Compliance Officer Samuel Lim are planning to seek the dismissal of the CFTC lawsuit filed earlier this year in March 2023. item.title: AI Text Detection Tool from OpenAI Closed Secretly
item.dc:creator: Godfrey Benjamin
item.description:
OpenAI, a leading artificial intelligence research lab, has recently made headlines by quietly shutting down its AI detection tool. OpenAI’s decision to unplug the AI Classifier was made discreetly, as no new announcement was made. Instead, the closure was showcased in a footnote to the original blog post announcing the tool’s release. The note simply
